barn_status_cal.name: barn_status_cal
barn_status_cal.calculation: if((${barn_status} ='active'), 'Active', if((${barn_status} ='plastic'), 'Active',  if((${barn_status} ='new'), 'Active',  if((${barn_status} ='repaired'), 'Active', if((${barn_status} ='not_used'), 'Not in Use', if((${barn_status} ='collapsed'), 'Collapsed',''))))))
